verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
This shall be the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H6879>leper<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%>: he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>; <S%H5061>and<s%>, behold, if the plague of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> be <S%H7495>healed<s%> in the <S%H6879>leper<s%>,

then shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> for him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%>, and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and <S%H231>hyssop<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> to <S%H7819>kill<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H6833>birds<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> over <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>.

As for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%>, he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H730>it<s%>, and the cedar <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and the <S%H231>hyssop<s%>, and shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> them and the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6833>bird<s%> that was <S%H7819>killed<s%> over the <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>:

And he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> upon him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>, and shall let <S%H7971>go<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> into the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>.

And he that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H1548>shave<s%> off all his <S%H8181>hair<s%>, and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water<s%>; and he shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>: and <S%H310>after<s%> that he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, but shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And it shall be on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> all his <S%H8181>hair<s%> off his <S%H7218>head<s%> and his <S%H2206>beard<s%> and his <S%H1354>eyebrows<s%>, even all his <S%H8181>hair<s%> he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H3526>off<s%>: and he shall wash his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>, and he shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3535>ewe-lamb<s%> <S%H1323>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that <S%H2891>cleanseth<s%> him shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, and those <S%H6440>things<s%>, before <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%>, and <S%H7126>offer<s%> him for a <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>, and the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

and he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H3532>he-lamb<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> and the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>: for as the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> is the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s, so is the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, and upon the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and upon the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it into the <S%H3709>palm<s%> of his <S%H3548>own<s%> left <S%H8042>hand<s%>;

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

and of the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H3709>hand<s%> shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> upon the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, and upon the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and upon the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%>, upon the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>:

and the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand<s%> he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> because of his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>: and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>;

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and the <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H2891>him<s%>, and he shall be clean.

And if he be <S%H1800>poor<s%>, and cannot <S%H3027>get<s%> so <S%H3947>much<s%>, then he shall take <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>he-lamb<s%> for a <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%> to be <S%H8573>waved<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H259>him<s%>, and one tenth part of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and a <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>;

and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtle-doves<s%>, or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%>, such as he is able to <S%H3027>get<s%>; and the <S%H259>one<s%> shall be a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> a <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>.

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them for his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>, and the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, and upon the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and upon the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> into the <S%H3709>palm<s%> of his <S%H3548>own<s%> left <S%H8042>hand<s%>;

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> with his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H676>finger<s%> some of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H3709>hand<s%> upon the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, and upon the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and upon the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%>, upon the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>:

and the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand<s%> he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And he shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8449>turtle-doves<s%>, or of the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%>, such <S%H834>as<s%> he is able to <S%H3027>get<s%>,

even such as <S%H3027>he<s%> is able to <S%H5381>get<s%>, the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>, with the <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When ye are <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which I <S%H5414>give<s%> to you for a <S%H272>possession<s%>, and I <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%>;

then he that owneth the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There <S%H7200>seemeth<s%> to me to be as it were a <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and shall <S%H7200>look<s%>; <S%H5061>and<s%>, behold, if the plague be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>;

and he shall cause the <S%H1004>house<s%> to be <S%H7106>scraped<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and they shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out the <S%H6083>mortar<s%>, that they <S%H7096>scrape<s%> <S%H2351>off<s%>, without the <S%H5892>city<s%> into an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>:

and they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H935>put<s%> them in the <S%H8478>place<s%> of those <S%H68>stones<s%>; and he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6083>mortar<s%>, and shall <S%H2902>plaster<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> come <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H6524>break<s%> out in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that he hath <S%H2502>taken<s%> out the <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> he hath <S%H7096>scraped<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> it is <S%H2902>plastered<s%>;

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> in and <S%H7200>look<s%>; <S%H5061>and<s%>, behold, if the plague be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, it is a <S%H3992>fretting<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>: it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall come <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H7200>look<s%>, <S%H5061>and<s%>, behold, the plague hath not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H2902>plastered<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2891>clean<s%>, because the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H7495>healed<s%>.
